Instructions:
**Alpha**: A, B, T, W, C, H
**Email**: alexis.flores@arrow.com

**Alpha**: I, J, K, E, F, #, signs, D, Q, U, V, X, Y, Z
**Email**: iliana.robles@arrow.com
Rationale: Handles Special Chars and Alpha Group I-Z.

Instructions:
**Alpha**: L, P, M, N, O, R, G
**Email**: valeria.sanchez@arrow.com

1. Search order/SO number in 'Digital Customer' Tab on SWB to see notes, vendor name, status, and internal tracking.\n2. Search order number in Salesforce to review cases handled by Support/OMT.\n3. For Supplier orders, search the PO number in Salesforce.
Rationale: Guidance for determining if an inquiry is already being handled and where to find internal tracking.

Instructions:
1. Open Digital Customer section from Customer Tab.
2. Search order with WEB SO or SO number.
3. Click on the order line to view OMT action notes.
4. Coordinate with appropriate teams; note that alert releases cannot be expedited.
Rationale: How to determine why an order is held by OMT and the rule on expedition.

Instructions:
1. Go to ETQ Portal > All Modules > eRequests.
2. New Document > Warehouse Requests > 'Sure Ship Domestic - Draft'.
3. Select Warehouse Code (e.g., V72).
4. Fill mandatory fields (Host is always 'AC Prod').
5. Enter Sales Order number, Delivery ID, and Pick Status note.
6. Click 'Send'.
Rationale: Expedite Reno warehouse orders that have been 'Released to Warehouse' or 'Picked' for more than 2 days.

Instructions:
1. Go to ETQ Portal > All Modules > eRequests.
2. New Document > Warehouse Requests > 'Receiving Expedite - Draft'.
3. Fill mandatory fields: Supplier PO, Carrier, Tracking Number, and Date of Arrival.
4. Use carrier portal to verify delivery.
5. If the DHL 'Signed By' name is unknown, use 'N/A'.
Rationale: Use for items delivered to the Reno facility but showing as 'Awaiting Receipt' for more than 3 days.

Instructions: 1. Open a Salesforce Case: 'Expedite Receiving [Supplier PO] / SO[NUM]'.\n2. Send an email to URGENTRECEIVING.HK@arrowasia.com.\n3. Provide the following mandatory data: Supplier PO, Sales Order, Supplier, Tracking Number, Carrier, Date of Arrival, MPN, and Qty.
Rationale: Specific procedure for Hong Kong items delivered but stuck in 'Awaiting Receipt' for more than 3 days.

Instructions:
1. For warehouse V90 requests, send an email to verical-logistics@verical.com with copy to amunoz@arrow.com, jawells@arrow.com.
2. Use the following template:
Hello Team
Could you please provide MFG CoC for:
WEB-SO:
PO:
Delivery ID#:
MPN:
Line#:
Regards
Rationale: Specific email template and contact list for Nogales warehouse documentation and status.

Instructions: 1. Go to MyConnect Portal.\n2. Select 'Report a Digital Issue'.\n3. You must provide: URL/Link of the page, Screenshot of the error, WEB-SO number, and the User Email address.
Rationale: For reporting technical errors or bugs on the Arrow.com or Verical.com websites.

Instructions: 1. Go to MyConnect Portal.\n2. Select 'Warehouse IT Support - WMS'.\n3. Use this for: Packing list reprint errors, SWB printer issues, and label reprinting problems.
Rationale: For technical errors regarding warehouse management and shipping systems.

Instructions:
1. Identify the unpaid order in the AP report.
2. Research if supplier shipped without approval or if a credit memo is possible.
3. Create a new SO using the exact same information as the original SO.
4. Update the Resale to $0.00 (to prevent credit need).
5. Remove any Freight charges to the customer.
6. Place SO on manual header hold: 'Replacement SO; reaching out to [THIRD PARTY SUPPLIER NAME] for PO Cancellation'.
Rationale: To pay third-party suppliers when the original sales order cannot be billed.

Instructions:
1. Wait 30 minutes for the Dropship PO# to generate in SWB (located in Info > Drop Ship).
2. OMT emails AP (Subject: Dropship Order D[NUM] - Please confirm receipt).
3. Body: 'Hello - Please confirm receipt of replacement Dropship Order D[NUM] to pay [SUPPLIER] for Invoice #[INV].'
4. Email 3rd party POC (Waldom: Kellys@waldom.com / Air Electro: LBuckley@airelectro.com) to cancel original PO.
Rationale: Finalizing the payment to the supplier and cancelling the redundant original order.

Instructions: 1. Reno [VXX] Packing List: https://wms-prod.arrow.com/PAWMSReprints/\n2. Non-Military CoC: https://arrow.tfaforms.net/4865283\n3. Military Parts (V37, VM5, V90, GN4, etc.): arrowcrm.my.salesforce-sites.com/arrowservices
Rationale: Direct access links for warehouse-specific documentation requests.
